EmailTemplate.name: Americana-EmailTemplate-LCM User Confirmation Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
#set($ctx = $spTools.class.forName("sailpoint.api.SailPointFactory").getMethod("getFactory", null).invoke(null,null).getCurrentContext()) #set($launcherObj = $ctx.getObjectByName($spTools.class.forName("sailpoint.object.Identity"), $launcher)) Dear $launcherObj.getDisplayName(),
Your requested role/access has been successfully provisioned, kindly validate the below requested Roles/Access
User Name : $idName
User DisplayName : $identityDisplayName
#if ($access) #foreach ($ac in $access) $ac #end #end
If you have any queries, please reach out at IAMsupport@Americana-food.com
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying users when accounts have been changed through Life Cycle Manager. Note that in addition to the declared arguments, all workflow variables, Step arguments, and Approval arguments defined in the Workflow are also available.

Argument.name: access
Argument.Description: list of access that are provisioned to the user.

Argument.name: launcher
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that launched the workflow.

Argument.name: idName
Argument.Description: The name of the Identity that is being changed.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the Identity that is being changed.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Access has been Added Successfully for : $identityDisplayName
